name: Cheesy (itch)
description:
Our first attempt at a 3D game, this game was developed for Ludum Dare 45 with the objective of learning and practing the basics of a 3D workflow. It’s been great and we learned as much as we struggled, and, oh boy, did we struggle…

Use W, A, S and D to move, Space to jump, Esc to release the cursor.

Reviews are highly welcome, especially along with learning resources and tips for 3D development!
